--- title: Infrahyoid muscle group --- So what fixes the hyoid bone in place you ask? INFRAHYOID muscles - sternohyoid, sternothyroid, thyrohyoid, omohyoid (inferior hyoid to sternum, thyroid cartilage, scapula) - help with speech, [swallowing]({{< var ref-swallowing.path >}}), and tongue movements - Sternohyoid - Sternothyroid - Thyrohyoid - Omohyoid ::: {#tbl-infrahyoid-muscle-group-oian .cell message='false' tbl-cap='Infrahyoid muscle group' execution_count=1} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
Muscle Origin Insertion Innervation Action
